```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("http://lozanoisla.com/setup.r")
library(readxl)
gsh <- paste0("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/"
              , "1dfgpmCKdPmxRHozrZp0iE_xMGsvKTIcztDpMWYSEGaY")
# browseURL(gsh)
gs <- as_sheets_id(gsh)
xl <- gs %>% drive_download("files/fieldbook.xlsx", overwrite = T) %>% pluck(2)
# fb <- xl %>% readxl::read_excel("fb") 
```

```{r igdocs, include=FALSE}
gdoc <- paste0("https://docs.google.com/document/d/"
               , "1osSykdzy6Kt20hK7yVL2fDLuA7kEHNsug6ejQFOpjUc")
# browseURL(gdoc)
googledrive::drive_download(file = gdoc
                            , path = "manuscript.txt"
                            , overwrite = T)
if(file.exists("manuscript.txt"))
  file.rename("manuscript.txt"
              , "manuscript.Rmd")
```

